article.title: Thales To Supply Night-Vision Goggles For French Army Helicopters
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The French Defense Procurement Agency (DGA) has awarded the Thales Group a contract to equip French army helicopter pilots with night-vision goggles. Under the five-year agreement, the company will supply the French army with 1,500 sets of goggles in several batches beginning in 2011.
